reporting-org.narrative: Organisation des Nations unies pour l'éducation, la science et la culture (UNESCO)
United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization (UNESCO)

title.narrative: Lifelong Learning (LLL) policy and Implementation plan - Support the revision and implementation of the Lifelong Learning policy and plans in recognizing education and lifelong learning as important drivers of sustainable development in Namibia

description.narrative: The overall focus is to identify and consolidate relevant priority areas and corresponding policies from different sectors. The areas may include (1) formal, non-formal and informal learning opportunities; (2) relevant strategies employed in different sub-sectors, from ECCE to tertiary, TVET and adult learning and education; (3) learning and education on cross-cutting issues; (4) quality assurance of education and learning; (5) national qualification frameworks and the recognition, validation and accreditation of learning outcomes; (6) ICTs and open learning approaches; and (7) institutionalized initiatives/approaches.

organisation.narrative: United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization (UNESCO)
